title: wine_Golan_Heights_Winery_2003_Yarden_Katzrin_Kosher_Red_(Galilee)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 86833.
country: Israel.
description: Produced only in outstanding vintages, this rich Bordeaux blend exudes fantastic flavors of black plum, blackberry and black cherry accented by notes of tobacco and white pepper. The bold palate and creamy texture lead in to a long and evolving finish that closes on a hint of mocha. The solid structure and assertive backbone ensure this wine will be a pleasure now and for years to come. Imported by Yarden Inc..
designation: Yarden Katzrin Kosher.
points: 90.
price: 100.0.
province: Galilee.
